display_long_description:
# A fitness trainer that actually connects with you. And talks back.
Your first VR training that genuinely feels personal.

Fun moves, modes, and exercises that make working out together even more fun.

[media]

Strength, cardio, boxing, recovery, posture, and focus come together in sessions that feel natural and motivating.
You’re not following a script. You’re training with someone fun.

An exceptional level of realism, visible in every aspect of the trainer.
[media]

Your trainer adapts to you, not the other way around.

Some days you want encouragement.
Other days you want to be pushed.

Supportive or strict. Calm or intense. Polite or super rude.
You decide how your trainer shows up and tells it to you straight.

[media]

Everything feels fresh. Nothing feels repetitive.

TrainR: Move is packed with quality content and keeps growing.
You’ll find structured programs, quick sessions, and themed content packs like K-Pop, Combat, Wellness, Farm Fit, Rock Gods, and Tropical Beach.

100+ original songs. The most beautiful environments. Endless new ways to feel good.
[media]

So when your motivation dips, the experience doesn’t.

Train in VR, or bring your trainer into your own room in Mixed Reality.

You don’t need perfect discipline.
You need something that makes it easier to come back, consistently.
Show up, move, and feel better when you’re done.

**This is the all-new TrainR: Move.**

**Try it for free right now.**
